entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
